content: This article **needs additional citations for verification**. Please help improve this article by adding citations to reliable sources. Unsourced material may be challenged and removed. *Find sources:* "Sabo" web series – news **·** newspapers **·** books **·** scholar **·** JSTOR *(June 2023)* *(Learn how and when to remove this message)*2015 TV series or program ***Sabo*** is a Singaporean [web series](/wiki/Web_series) which was launched on 6 April 2015 and hosted by [Mike Kasem](/wiki/Mike_Kasem). It is the first web series to be launched on [Mediacorp](/wiki/Mediacorp) interactive service Toggle, following the closure of [xinmsn](/wiki/Xinmsn). The series is a reality hidden-camera show which pranks Mediacorp artistes and local celebs unsuspectingly. ## Victims Apart from episodes 7 and 9, which are rated PG13, all episodes are rated PG. #VictimRelease date1[Ian Fang](/wiki/Ian_Fang)April 6, 2015 (2015-04-06)2Daniella SyaApril 13, 2015 (2015-04-13)3[Shane Pow](/wiki/Shane_Pow)April 20, 2015 (2015-04-20)4[Jayley Woo](/wiki/Jayley_Woo)April 27, 2015 (2015-04-27)5Sonia ChewMay 4, 2015 (2015-05-04)6[Kimberly Chia](/wiki/Kimberly_Chia)June 29, 2015 (2015-06-29)7[Jimmy Taenaka](/wiki/Jimmy_Taenaka)July 5, 2015 (2015-07-05) PG13 Brief Coarse Language8[Fandi Ahmad](/wiki/Fandi_Ahmad)July 12, 2015 (2015-07-12)9Joakim GomezJuly 19, 2015 (2015-07-19) PG13 Mature Themes10[Kym Ng](/wiki/Kym_Ng)July 26, 2015 (2015-07-26)11[Chen Hanwei](/wiki/Chen_Hanwei)August 2, 2015 (2015-08-02)12[Zoe Tay](/wiki/Zoe_Tay)August 9, 2015 (2015-08-09) This article about media in Singapore is a stub. title: Sabo (web series)
